text:
Vigiglobe | Sophia Antipolis, France (in the French Riviera, near Nice). ON SITE or REMOTE.

Real time social media analytics. Mostly we need a full stack Clojure/Clojurescript engineer.

The existing code is mostly Clojure, there is also some bit of Haskell.

More informations here: https://www.vigiglobe.com/jobs/

jobs@vigiglobe.com
